summary: Everybody loves beautiful Alisha and it's no surprise that nerdy Abhay loves her too but she doesn't know he exists until years later their paths cross.
cast: Priyanka Chopra|Anupam Kher|Uday Chopra|Dino Morea|Jugal Hansraj|Nataliya Kozhenova|Madhura Naik|Arjun Sablok|Rahul Vohra|Shivansu Sachan|Advika Yadav|Saidah Jules|Creighton Mark Johnson|Mark Charnick|Michael Charnick|David Firefly
title: Pyaar Impossible!
